messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] The Blob/monsters?
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/15/2003 2:00:25 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Check out Ebay.  They have a couple DVD s of the Blob for only about 4 dollars! Everytime
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/15/2003 2:00:25 PM Eastern Standard Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:

> I tried to buy her The Blob, but was told it's OUT OF PRINT!!!! yikes.
> How
> could a movie that terrible be unavailable?? <bwg>
>
Check out Ebay. They have a couple DVD's of the Blob for only about 4
dollars!

Everytime someone has told us a movie is out of print, we've checked Ebay and
voila...20 copies or so. Sometimes you have to pay a lot for them, or
sometimes they're used, but if you really want the movie it's a great resource.

Nancy B.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
